snippet.title: Mia's Math Adventure: Just in Time! - Full Playthrough
snippet.description:
Mia's Math Adventure: Just in Time! is a game released by Kutoka Interactive in 2001. It is the third game in the Mia's Big Adventure Collection series. In this game, Mia's house suddenly burns down one night. In order to reverse the tragedy, Mia must collect parts to build a time machine and travel back in time to prevent the fire. The player can move Mia around the screen by using the mouse and can click on objects to interact with them. There are also several math-based challenges that must be completed.

For more games in the Mia series, see this playlist:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL8B6J1vqywevY-WsEHGPw8Wzsdvf-vxH7

This recording has a few minor bugs. I attempted multiple recordings of this game and none of them were without problems, so I think is about the best I can do. Fortunately, these issues are only in a tiny fraction of the overall playthrough, and I don't think they should detract from the quality much.

Disclaimer: I own nothing in this video, all rights are reserved by the respective owners.
